com.github.robtimus.io.stream

Class RandomInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.github.robtimus.io.stream.RandomInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public final class RandomInputStream
extends InputStream
    An input stream that will return random bytes. This input stream supports mark(int) and reset(). It comes with a default mark at the start of the stream, which means that reset() can be called at any time.
    Author:
    Rob Spoor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RandomInputStream.Builder
      A builder for random input streams.

      • usingAllBytes

        public static RandomInputStream.Builder usingAllBytes()
        Returns a builder for random input streams that can return all possible bytes.
        Returns:
        A builder for random input streams that can return all possible bytes.

      • usingRange

        public static RandomInputStream.Builder usingRange(int start,
                                                   int end)
        Returns a builder for random input streams that can return bytes from a specific range. For the start and end of the range, only the 8 low-order bits are used; the 24 high-order bits are ignored. It's therefore advised to use unsigned values between 0 and 255 or 0xFF.
        Parameters:
        start - The start of the range, inclusive.
        end - The end of the range, inclusive.
        Returns:
        A builder for random input streams that can return bytes from the given range.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If start is larger than end.

      • usingRangeFrom

        public static RandomInputStream.Builder usingRangeFrom(int start)
        Returns a builder for random input streams that can return bytes from a specific range. This method is equal to usingRange(start, 0xFF).
        Parameters:
        start - The start of the range, inclusive.
        Returns:
        A builder for random input streams that can return bytes from the given range.

      • usingRangeUntil

        public static RandomInputStream.Builder usingRangeUntil(int end)
        Returns a builder for random input streams that can return bytes from a specific range. This method is equal to usingRange(0, end).
        Parameters:
        end - The end of the range, inclusive.
        Returns:
        A builder for random input streams that can return bytes from the given range.

      • usingGenerator

        public static RandomInputStream.Builder usingGenerator(ToIntFunction<Random> generator)
        Returns a builder for random input streams that uses a custom generator for bytes. For each generated value, only the 8 low-order bits are used; the 24 high-order bits are ignored.
        Parameters:
        generator - The generator to use.
        Returns:
        A builder for random input streams that uses the given custom generator.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the given custom generator is null.
